HEALTH & ENVIRONMENT COMMITTEE
COMMITTEE MEETING
~ MINUTES ~
Tuesday, April 26, 2022

11:00 AM

Sullivan Chamber

The Health and Environment Committee will meet to conduct a public hearing on a proposal to
amend Section 2.66 of the Municipal Code to add a new section titled “Article III Green Jobs".
Attendee Name
Patricia Nolan
Burhan Azeem
Dennis J. Carlone
Marc C. McGovern
Quinton Zondervan

Amend Section 2.66 of the Municipal Code to add a new section titled “Article III Green Jobs."
(Ordinance # 2022-6)
